script.name: plugin.customstart.config
script.sourceplaintext:
* ======================================== * Custom Start Configuration * ======================================== * Called after the custom start menu to configure the game based on the data table * ======================================== * Author: Cycrow * Date: 2018/05/06 * Updated: 2022/07/28 * ======================================== * V7 - Moved terran start to seperate script * ========================================
set total player discovery points: 0 set available player discovery points: 0
* ======================= * Terran Sectors if not $a.data['terran.plot'] @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.customstart.terran : end *$value = $a.data['terrans'] *if $value == 1 *set global variable: name='no.terrans' value=[TRUE] *else if $value == 2 *= [THIS] -> call script plugin.customstart.terran : *end
$sector = get sector from universe index: x=0, y=0 @ $sectors.array = [THIS] -> call script !lib.sectors.getconnected : Connected To=$sector Only Known=[FALSE] Sort by Name=[FALSE]
$player.race = $a.data['race'] $player.race ->set known status to [TRUE] set player race: $player.race $value = $a.data['name'] set player name: name=$value do if $a.data['race.gender'] set global variable: name='player.female' value=[TRUE]
* Check starting sector $start.sector = $a.data['sector'] if $start.sector == 'random' $rnd = size of array $sectors.array $rnd = random value from 0 to $rnd - 1 $start.sector = $sectors.array[$rnd] else if $start.sector == 'randomrace' $table = table alloc $i = size of array $sectors.array while $i dec $i = $sector = $sectors.array[$i] $owner = $sector -> get owner race do if $owner == $player.race $table[$sector] = $sector end if size of table $table $start.sector = get random key: table=$table end end
if not is datatype[ $start.sector ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR $start.sector = get random array item: array=$sectors.array else if not $start.sector -> is of class Sector $start.sector = get random array item: array=$sectors.array end
* Set the known sectors $known.sectors = table alloc
$value = $a.data['known.sectors.type'] if $value == 'selection' $known.sectors = $a.data['known.sectors'] else if $value == 'all' OR $value == 'all.race' $i = size of array $sectors.array while $i dec $i = $sector = $sectors.array[$i] if $value == 'all.race' $owner = $owner -> get owner race skip if $owner == $player.race continue end $known.sectors[$sector] = [TRUE] end end
$known.sectors[$start.sector] = [TRUE]
$x = get max sectors in x direction while $x dec $x = $y = get max sectors in y direction while $y dec $y = $sector = get sector from universe index: x=$x, y=$y skip if $sector continue skip if $sector -> exists continue if $known.sectors[$sector] $value = [TRUE] else $value = [FALSE] end
$arr = $sector -> get station array from sector $i = size of array $arr while $i dec $i = $key = $arr[$i] $key ->set known status to $value end $i = 6 while $i dec $i = $key = $sector -> get warp gate: gate id=$i do if $key -> exists $key ->set known status to $value end $sector ->set known status to $value end end
* ======================= * Xenon HUB if not $a.data['hub.plot'] $value = $a.data['hub'] if $value @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.activate.xenonhub : Sector=$start.sector Minimum Jumps=5 No Delay=[TRUE] end end
* ======================= * Player Headquarters if not $a.data['hq.plot'] $value = $a.data['phq'] if $value == 'findable' @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.create.findable.hq : Start Sector=$start.sector Minimum Jumps=5 No Delay=[TRUE] else if $value == 'start.sector' $object.type = Spacelab Headquarters $object.pos = $start.sector gosub sub.CreateStation else if $value == 'random' $object.type = Spacelab Headquarters $object.pos = get random key: table=$known.sectors gosub sub.CreateStation else if $value != 'no' $object.type = Spacelab Headquarters $object.pos = $value gosub sub.CreateStation end end
* ======================= * Start Ship $object.type = $a.data['start.ship'] $object.pos = $start.sector $object.loadout = $a.data['start.ship.loadout'] gosub sub.CreateShip $start.ship = $created = $start.ship -> install 1 units of Singularity Engine Time Accelerator
* ======================= * Ranks $value = $a.data['traderank'] $value = get trade ranking: title=$value set player trade rank: rank=$value $value = $a.data['fightrank'] $value = get fight ranking: title=$value set player fight rank: rank=$value $value = $a.data['racerank'] $value = $value - 5 $value = get rank points: level=$value set notoriety of $player.race -> Player to $value points if $a.data['random.ranks'] $arr = get race array: include fixed=[FALSE], include corporations=[TRUE], include player=[FALSE] $i = size of array $arr while $i dec $i = $value = $arr[$i] do if $value == $player.race continue if $value ->race has ranking $rnd = random value from -5 to 11 - 1 $rnd = get rank points: level=$rnd set notoriety of $value -> Player to $rnd points end end else $table = $a.data['ranks'] $owner = get next key: table=$table key=null while $owner if $owner != $player.race $value = $table[$owner] if not is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_NULL $value = $value - 5 $value = get rank points: level=$value set notoriety of $owner -> Player to $value points end end $owner = get next key: table=$table key=$owner end end
* ======================= * Money $value = $a.data['money'] $money = get player money $value = $value - $money add money to player: $value
* ======================= * Satalites $value = $a.data['sats'] if $value == 1 $created = create ship: type=Advanced Satellite owner=Player addto=$start.sector x=0 y=-10000 z=0 else if $value == 2 OR $value == 3 $sector = get next key: table=$known.sectors key=null while $sector $value = $sector $sector = get next key: table=$known.sectors key=$sector if $value == 2 $owner = $value -> get owner race $noto = get notoriety from race $owner to race Player skip if $noto >= [Notoriety.Friend] continue end $created = create ship: type=Advanced Satellite owner=Player addto=$value x=0 y=-10000 z=0 end end
* ======================= * Ships $ships.table = $a.data['ships'] if $ships.table $object.type = get next key: table=$ships.table key=null while $object.type $table = $ships.table[$object.type] $object.loadout = get next key: table=$table key=null while $object.loadout $value = $table[$object.loadout] while $value dec $value = $object.pos = $start.sector gosub sub.CreateShip end $object.loadout = get next key: table=$table key=$object.loadout end $object.type = get next key: table=$ships.table key=$object.type end end
* ======================= * Stationos $ships.table = $a.data['stations'] if $ships.table $object.type = get next key: table=$ships.table key=null while $object.type $arr = $ships.table[$object.type] $i = size of array $arr while $i dec $i = $object.pos = $arr[$i] gosub sub.CreateStation end $object.type = get next key: table=$ships.table key=$object.type end end
* ======================= * Special race adjustments if $player.race == Pirates OR $player.race == Yaki OR $player.race == Duke's $aStations = get station array: of race $player.race class/type=Station if $aStations $i = size of array $aStations while $i dec $i = $station = $aStations[$i] $station ->set relation against Player to Neutral end end end
* ======================= * Plots $game.state = $a.data['plot.state'] if $game.state == 1 @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.oldplot.start : Start ID=0 Group ID=10000 send script event: name='init.tc', object=[PLAYERSHIP], param1=null, param2=null else if $game.state == 2 @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.oldplot.start : Start ID=0 Group ID=10100 send script event: name='init.ap', object=[PLAYERSHIP], param1=null, param2=null else @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.oldplot.start : Start ID=0 Group ID=300 end
$plots = $a.data['hub.plot'] if $plots == 1 send script event: name='init.tc.hub', object=[PLAYERSHIP], param1=null, param2=null else if $plots == 2 send script event: name='init.ap.hub', object=[PLAYERSHIP], param1=null, param2=null end
$plots = $a.data['hq.plot'] if $plots == 1 send script event: name='init.tc.hq', object=[PLAYERSHIP], param1=null, param2=null else if $plots == 2 send script event: name='init.ap.hq', object=[PLAYERSHIP], param1=null, param2=null end
* ======================= return $start.ship
sub.CheckObjectPosition: do if is datatype[ $object.pos ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY endsub $arr = array alloc: size=4 $sub.Value = random value from -25000 to 25000 - 1 $arr[0] = $sub.Value $sub.Value = random value from 10000 to 25000 - 1 do if random value from 0 to 2 - 1 $sub.Value = - $sub.Value $arr[1] = $sub.Value $sub.Value = random value from -25000 to 25000 - 1 $arr[2] = $sub.Value $arr[3] = $object.pos $object.pos = $arr endsub
sub.CreateStation: gosub sub.CheckObjectPosition $x = $object.pos[0] $y = $object.pos[1] $z = $object.pos[2] $sector = $object.pos[3] $created = create station: type=$object.type owner=Player addto=$sector x=$x y=$y z=$z if $created -> exists $created ->set station safe position on active: value=[TRUE] $created ->add default wares to station/dock do if $created -> is of class Factory $created ->factory production task: on=[TRUE] $created ->station trade and production tasks: on=[TRUE] if $created -> is of class Headquarters = [PLAYERSHIP] -> add 1 units of Low Frequency Locator = [PLAYERSHIP] -> add 1 units of Interplanetary Drive System $agent = $created ->create agent: race=$player.race, female=[FALSE], tasks=5 $blueprint = Relay Beacon $created ->add blueprints to player HQ: type=$blueprint end end endsub
sub.CreateShip: gosub sub.CheckObjectPosition $x = $object.pos[0] $y = $object.pos[1] $z = $object.pos[2] $sector = $object.pos[3] if $object.type == 'random.race' $object.type = get random ship type: class=Ship race=$player.race else if $object.type == 'random' $aRaces = get race array: include fixed=[FALSE], include corporations=[TRUE], include player=[FALSE] while size of array $aRaces $race = get random array item: array=$aRaces $object.type = get random ship type: class=Ship race=$race if not $object.type find and remove: $race from array $aRaces else break end end end skip if is datatype[ $object.type ] == DATATYPE_WARE $object.type = Discoverer $created = create ship: type=$object.type owner=Player addto=$sector x=$x y=$y z=$z if $object.loadout == 'loadout.default' $created ->add default items to ship: loadout=[ShipLoad.Average], marines=[FALSE] else if $object.loadout == 'loadout.s' $created ->install ship size wares: type=[ShipWare.S] else if $object.loadout == 'loadout.m' $created ->install ship size wares: type=[ShipWare.M] else if $object.loadout == 'loadout.l' $created ->install ship size wares: type=[ShipWare.L] end $max.shield = $created -> get maximum shield strength $created ->set current shield strength to $max.shield if $created -> is of class M7D $object.type = $created ->get drone type $i = 4 while $i dec $i = $drone = create ship: type=$object.type owner=Player addto=$created x=null y=null z=null $created ->add managed ship: ship=$drone, role=Drone end end endsub return null

comment.var: Called after the custom start menu to configure the game based on the data table
V7 - Moved terran start to seperate script

line.text: get sector from universe index: x=
get max sectors in x direction
get max sectors in y direction
get sector from universe index: x=
set station safe position on active: value=
station trade and production tasks: on=
add blueprints to player HQ: type=
add default items to ship: loadout=

sval.val: Called after the custom start menu to configure the game based on the data table
